channel.title: MM-Cat, Mephedrone
channel.description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mephedrone]Mephedrone[/url]
A Legal drug, as for now..
It is sold on the internet and in "herbal high" shops as "plant feeder", has anyone else experienced it?
I sell it and i think it has the potential to save clubbing, as the drought of pure MDMA has arisen over the past year or so, there are no good pills or party drugs (hence which why i went to Ketamine for the last year).
I have tried this MM-cat and it is very very good, a lot like MDMA with no come down at all!
at about £8 a gram, or $15 for you Americans, this is the best, cheap alternative if you cannot find any MDMA,
if you are familiar with the effects of MDMA, this MM-cat will feel like you are "coming up" from an MDMA buzz for about an hour, then wear off (unless you top it off), it can be taken orally by putting it in a tablet or rizzla and bombing it, or (the way I prefer) to snort it, as you gradually get fucked and you are not fucked for the next few days rushing off the one drop..
has anyone else experienced this new drug? do you think it will be banned pretty soon? I heard there are plans for it to be banned in the UK by the end of this year.

item.title: MM-Cat, Mephedrone
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:36, topic:309631”]Haha, just ignore the Sun. Not saying there’s no dangers, but that article is so chock full of sensationalist bullshit.

“Sold as plant fertiliser” = True, but the key phrase is “sold as”. It’s sold as plant feed because selling it for human consumption draws attention, nothing more. It’s not actually any good for plants.

“One molecule different from MDMA” = Lol. I wonder who researchers this shit. I see what they’re getting at, but uh… no.

“a large number of users report how addictive it is and that they’re constantly topping up” = Yeah, I’ve seen this too. On forums. Now we know where they “research” ;)[/quote]

I only posted it because they kid ripped his balls off… most news papers are a pile of shit anyway

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:21, topic:309631”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=406082.msg3004489#msg3004489 date=1256264602]

Just the little bit I have read on this in this thread and on a few other sites it seems like an insanely bad idea for anyone to try this stuff. If it has so many bad reactions with so many common substances then it is bound to kill a lot of people, but then the kind of people that kill themselves taking drugs like this we really don’t want passing on their genes anyhow do we? So maybe it is a good thing…

i wish more people would understand that last point, like, why help a mentally retarded person live, when they are just going to make more retard babies that are useless to the world
[/quote]
So no more Moparscape then.

On topic: TBH just stick to weed. Weed has hardly any side affects.[/quote][quote=“Mopman, post:22, topic:309631”]or any positive ones

(imo)[/quote]

I fucking love you Mopman.
So true, Pot has no positive side effects

item.title: MM-Cat, Mephedrone
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:25, topic:309631”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=406082.msg3001522#msg3001522 date=1256037712]
This is not something to be fucked with. If this shit gets popular we might be in for a lot of trouble.

It has only been around for a few years, so there is fuck all study done on human use unlike MDMA.

It has been shown to cause pulmonary valve cardiac fibrosis (through 5-HTB stimulation IIRC, which MDMA does not do) - this is no fucking joke. This isn’t like when people say “heavy use of cocaine might fuck your heart” or “don’t drink too much coffee”. This is like “moderate or even occasional use is causing your hearts valves to scar up”.

It causes blood clotting issues.

It’s “probably” a strong MAOI. MAOI’s can cause some fucking weird (+ fatal) reactions with many other drugs and even some foods. If this gets really popular, people are not going to know this (avoid cheese, for example :/)

Due to the name we’ve given it, its easily confused with methadrone. This is pretty much intentional. Methadrone is almost certainly even worse for you, and methadrone isn’t even a good name for it chemically. I can only assume someone christened it that so that people who didn’t know what they were talking about bought methadrone assuming it was mephedrone.

Finally, the mental effects, while similar to MDMA and speed (possible psychosis given heavy use, if used normally yknow that comedown head feeling) seem to linger around for a lot longer when people hammer this stuff like they do MDMA. Neurotoxicity has been speculated.

I know nobodies gonna listen to me, but I cannot stress enough how much this shit should not be fucked with until we know more and have sorted out the kinks. If people start fucking themselves up, even if it gets blamed on the drug war for screwing the purity of MDMA and misinformation re:how safe MDMA is (which it won’t) that isn’t gonna bring back peoples hearts and brain function.

[/quote]

You convinced the living shit out of me[/quote]

Yeh, he should work for the government designing anti-drugs marketing. Frank just seems like a friendly chap who gives me advice on my local street price.

Read full topic

Methadrone is almost certainly even worse for you, and methadrone isn’t even a good name for it chemically. I know nobodies gonna listen to me, but I cannot stress enough how much this shit should not be fucked with until we know more and have sorted out the kinks. If people start fucking themselves up, even if it gets blamed on the drug war for screwing the purity of MDMA and misinformation re:how safe MDMA is (which it won’t) that isn’t gonna bring back peoples hearts and brain function.[/quote]

item.title: MM-Cat, Mephedrone
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Not X A Alex:

Not saying Mopman is wrong, just I’d like a source to agree with what Mopman has said before I believe it 100%.

I’m not saying I’m right either, and I’d love a source too - unfortunately nobody has any yet, because very little is known about the stuff.

It looks like I may have been wrong about the heart issues and that may be methadrone. Not got time to find where I read that now, but I will, if thats the case mephedrone would be a lot less potentially dangerous, to me anyway, the heart shit was the main worry.

God damn the similar names :[ (ps did I mention mephedrone makes 0 sense :P)

EDIT: Oh yeah, I remember what else I was gonna say - UK guys who are looking for analogues, I believe bk-MDMA (“methylone”… FUCKING names :P) is still legal here. It’s not in the USA, or probably anywhere else, since our analogue laws are way looser.

Read full topic
